habit_list.description: List of actionable sales tactics (hook + tips + CTA)
habit_list.prompt_template:
Generate a save-worthy carousel about {topic} for sales professionals.

Format: habit_list
Slides: {slide_count}

Structure:
- Slide 1 (Hook): Attention-grabbing opener (max 18 words)
- Slides 2-{tip_end}: Individual tactical tips (max 18 words each)
- Slide {last} (CTA): Call to action encouraging saves

Brand voice: {voice}
Tone: Confident, tactical, experience-based, results-focused

Return JSON with this structure:
{{
  "hook": "slide 1 text",
  "slides": [
    {{"slide_num": 1, "text": "hook text", "type": "hook"}},
    {{"slide_num": 2, "text": "tip text", "type": "tip"}},
    ...
    {{"slide_num": {last}, "text": "cta text", "type": "cta"}}
  ],
  "caption": "Brief caption with {max_hashtags} hashtags from: {hashtags}",
  "topic": "{topic}"
}}

Requirements:
- Max 18 words per slide
- Battle-tested, actionable tactics
- Professional but conversational
- Hook score: min 14/20
- Focus on save-worthy field-tested advice

step_guide.description: Numbered step-by-step sales process (hook + steps + CTA)
step_guide.prompt_template:
Generate a step-by-step sales process carousel about {topic}.

Format: step_guide
Steps: {step_count}

Structure:
- Slide 1 (Hook): Attention-grabbing opener (max 18 words)
- Slides 2-{step_end}: Numbered tactical steps (max 18 words each)
- Slide {last} (CTA): Call to action encouraging saves

Brand voice: {voice}
Tone: Confident, tactical, experience-based, results-focused

Return JSON with this structure:
{{
  "hook": "slide 1 text",
  "slides": [
    {{"slide_num": 1, "text": "hook text", "type": "hook"}},
    {{"slide_num": 2, "text": "Step 1: action text", "type": "step"}},
    {{"slide_num": 3, "text": "Step 2: action text", "type": "step"}},
    ...
    {{"slide_num": {last}, "text": "cta text", "type": "cta"}}
  ],
  "caption": "Brief caption with {max_hashtags} hashtags from: {hashtags}",
  "topic": "{topic}"
}}

Requirements:
- Max 18 words per slide
- Number each step clearly (Step 1:, Step 2:, etc.)
- Sequential tactical actions
- Professional but conversational
- Hook score: min 14/20
- Focus on proven processes
